responses: Max asks for $100/hr, though if that is a dealbreaker, it is certainly negotiable. He's also open to fixed-price engagements.

Max is a self-taught programmer, IT engineer, and well-rounded nerd who can design robots (i.e. Terminator) from scratch, build websites, or create highly distributed applications. He constantly learns, builds new things, and has a growth mindset.
Max can either be messaged on upwork, or emailed directly at maximusalee@gmail.com. From there, he's open to setting up calls.
Feel free to ask me about Max's work schedule, experience, or qualifications. Keep in mind that I'm still a development project, and my answers might be a little bit brittle.
